@The_Orbicular_Lamp_87: To be honest, the story is force this in, she's apparently a pervert or sex maniac or something. But that's kinda normal in webtoons, like in here, the mc just casually fucks around and the girl here aren't fucked other than the mc, she got fingered at max I guess. Maybe the dad done her once I dont' know actually. Also in webtoons usually even if the story is has the premise of two character love story, there are going to be other female characters which the mc going to fuck just for the sake of it, although it usually doesn't going into the ntr route.

Okay so I was already I little iffy on the original premise simply cause I didn’t like the idea of the main heroine having sex with the dad. I was hoping for a nice, wholesome love story. This is not a nice wholesome love story. I’ll admit, I did skip a ton of pages, so I don’t know how she ended up in a gangbang, but I hate it either way.
Anyone knows when's the next chapter comming out....???
Whoa, this story goes like zip zap. Everything is done very quickly (kinda rushed) that make my heart and dd goes up and down in very high pace.
where is ch 76

Basically the story is that the girl loves the MC and the MC also loves her but somehow because he never had a mom and always wanted one the girl to make his dream come true decides to marry his dad so she can become his mom...then it just spirals out of control from there.
Dafuq is this?

Im not even gonna bother with the implications, the self explanitory title sums up the stupid premise. Webtoons/manhwas have such huge potential in how its art can look but most of the writing is cookie cutter trash, I guess its to be expected when its more easier to pump out unlike actual manga and comics.
RIP MC, this may not be a netorare, or is a netori where MC steal, but the fact she still becoming your mother and will marry his father is kind of frustrating
Damn bro rip the MC. Even when he’s being honest the main slut ain’t having it. Least the Boi’s got plenty of options

Dude I don't fucking know why everybody thinks this is a korean webtoon. I mean open your eyes. That's just some regular lame ass doujin. Even the original title and the authors name are Japanese. Stop hating on k toons because of that. But it's not like anybody expected a bit of brain on a doujin site anyway.
As a person who likes things to end wholesome this doesn't feel like it would, since a lot of Korean Doujinshi doesn't end very well, it seems like this is a lost.

I don't know man, but I think most korean doujin/hentai got a thing with NTR/cheating. Like, every fucking time I read korean hentai and it would go from wholesome to NTR real fast. Looks like they love to get cuck

What a messed up and all over the place story lmao, honestly really makes me curious if people actually fap to these or not. I mean I just skimmed it and there were some decent scenes so I wouldn’t be that surprised, but the story is such a train wreck that I’d imagine more people probably read it in the same way you watch a B-movie
